text: Alison Hammond (born 5 February 1975) is a British TV presenter, reality star and actress. Hammond was born to Jamaican parents and was raised in Birmingham. In 2023, she became a presenter on The Great British Bake Off'. == Career == She is best known for co-presenting ITV's daytime show This Morning as well as being a contestant on Big Brother in 2002. After appearing on Big Brother, Hammond appeared in multiple other TV shows including I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!. In 2023, she started co-presenting The Great British Bake Off with Noel Fielding. == References == Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Birmingham Category:British television presenters
title: Alison Hammond
